name: Bertyx
overview: Bertyx is a Polish language science-fiction themed arcade adventure game. In 3090, remains of a lost civilization under the ice surface of the planet Bertyx were discovered. Contact with the research expedition stopped immediately after unfreezing a found alien. Terence decides to send a robot to the ice base. Its aim is to find nine pieces of a computer access card. After transferring data from the computer, the robot has to start the self-destruct sequence.
